page.title: 16Mrs Hunkin's Day.
page.content: 7.10am. My day begins,Iget up, call my daughter Julie and prepare her breakfast of coffee and toast. 8.15am. Call Alan and prepare his tea and toast. 8.45am. I have my breakfast.Take Patch the dog for a walk and give her her insulin injection 10.25am. Have coffee break with my husband. 10.30am. Washing, hoovering, bedmaking or answering telephone queries regarding my husbands television repair business. 1.00pm. Lunch and watch news on T.V. 2.00pm. Housework, gardening, shopping or visit my father until 3.30pm. when Alan returns from school. 4.30pm. Prepare evening meal for 6.00pm., tidy up, watch T.V., listen to music or read. 11.00pm. Igo to bed.
